name: Tower: Land of Aerdya
description:
So you like Open World, Action, Adventure  games? Welcome to Aerdya.

You play as Arc. He is something you call SpiritMage and your duty to travel the Land and clear out the Towers.  These are in different types of Region. You can collect Skillpoints and learn new Skills. Do the Quests and Solve the Puzzles. Be the Hero that Aerdya needs. Enjoy!

TRAILER

Notes: This game is in-development. The  next update will be Desert region.
